project_name.justification: The authoritative project name is Independence, and the text refers to the 'Independence Gold Project' and 'development-stage Independence project'.

company_name.justification: The authoritative company name is James Bay Minerals Limited. The text confirms this company is the buyer in the primary transaction: 'James Bay Minerals (ASX: JBY) (“James Bay”, or “the Company”) is pleased to announce that it has entered a binding agreement pursuant to which the Company has the right to acquire up to 100% of the advanced Independence Gold Project'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is James Bay Minerals, and the contact provided is 'James Bay Executive Director, Andrew Dornan, commented:'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement gives James Bay Minerals the right to acquire the full project interest: 'the Company has the right to acquire up to 100% of the advanced Independence Gold Project'.

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative commodity is Au, and the text consistently refers to the project as the 'Independence Gold Project'.

verified_article_link.justification: Both provided documents are about the Independence project. The first document, from Nexus Uranium (the seller), contains a verifiable link. The second document details the acquisition by James Bay Minerals (the buyer).

currency.justification: The upfront consideration for the acquisition by James Bay Minerals is valued in Australian Dollars (A$): 'being ~A$2.4M at a deemed issued price of A$0.15 per share'. Subsequent cash payments and commitments are denominated in USD.

cash_payments_raw.justification: This is the sum of future cash payments in USD as part of the earn-in agreement with AGEI: 'Pay US$1,500,000 to AGEI' (Stage 2) and 'A cash fee of US$2,000,000 is payable to AGEI within 12 months of commencing production'. Note: This value is in USD.

share_payments_raw.justification: This represents the upfront share consideration valued at A$2,437,500 for the initial 51.54% interest. The full transaction also includes additional share payments (2,000,000 shares and US$500,000 in shares) as part of the earn-in agreement. The text states: '16.25M shares, being ~A$2.4M at a deemed issued price of A$0.15 per share'.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: This field is null because financial data is being populated under Priority 1 of the financial extraction hierarchy, using `cash_payments_raw` and `share_payments_raw`.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: This field is null because financial data is being populated under Priority 1 of the financial extraction hierarchy (`cash_payments_raw` and `share_payments_raw`).

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: This field is null because financial data is being populated under Priority 1 of the financial extraction hierarchy (`cash_payments_raw` and `share_payments_raw`).

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not in meters of drilling.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The earn-in requires James Bay Minerals to 'Incur at least US$1,500,000 in exploration expenditure within 1 year' for Stage 1 and 'Incur at least US$1,500,000 in exploration expenditure within 1 year of Stage 1' for Stage 2, for a total of US$3,000,000.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: As part of the transaction, the seller AGEI retains a royalty: 'AGEI will be granted a 2.0% net smelter return royalty ("Royalty").'

coverage_area_raw.justification: No coverage area, acreage, or land size is mentioned in the provided text for the Independence project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area, acreage, or land size is mentioned in the provided text for the Independence project.

resource_size.value: 334,300 ounces of gold (28M tonnes at 0.41 g/t gold) and an inferred resource of 847,000 ounces (9M tonnes at 3.22 g/t gold) of gold with a substantial silver credit
resource_size.justification: The text states: 'The Independence project hosts an M&I (measured and indicated) resource of 334,300 ounces of gold (28M tonnes at 0.41 g/t gold) and an inferred resource of 847,000 ounces (9M tonnes at 3.22 g/t gold) of gold with a substantial silver credit.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as James Bay Minerals, whose ticker is provided in the text: 'James Bay Minerals (ASX: JBY)'.
